resolution_description: User could resolve the issue of fake reviews in the restaurant and tourism industry by developing a decentralized blockchain-based review platform where only verified customers, proven via smart contracts linked to actual transactions, can leave reviews, ensuring authenticity and transparency.

required_participants.reasoning: The founders of the startup are crucial as they will drive the development and implementation of the decentralized blockchain-based review platform. Their vision and technical expertise will be essential in creating the infrastructure needed to ensure the platform's success.

Tourists and clients are the primary users of the review platform. Their participation is vital to provide genuine feedback and validate the effectiveness of the system. Engaging them ensures that the platform meets their needs and fosters trust in the authenticity of reviews.

Restaurants are key stakeholders who will benefit from authentic reviews that can attract customers. Their involvement is necessary for the platform's acceptance and adoption, as they will need to participate actively in the verification process and respond to customer feedback.

Investors are important for funding the development and marketing of the platform. Their financial support will enable the startup to build and scale the technology, attracting more users and restaurants to the platform, thereby enhancing credibility and sustainability.

resolution_description: Hotel Chains could resolve the issue of fake reviews in the restaurant and tourism industry by implementing a real-time, AI-driven guest feedback system integrated directly into hotel and restaurant operations, allowing businesses to address concerns instantly and gather authentic, immediate reviews from verified guests during their stay or visit, thereby fostering genuine customer engagement and trust.
